text: Allaha tumacya vyartha, nirarthaka sapathambaddala tumaci pakada karita nahi tathapi asaca sapathambaddala pakada karato, jya tumhi pakkya iradyane ghetalya. Tyace prayascitta daha garibanna bhojana dene, baryapaiki, jase apalya gharacya lokanna kha'u ghalata kinva tyanna kapade latte dene kinva eka gulama athava dasi mukta karane, ani jyala he sakya nasela tara tyane tina divasa roje (upavasa- vrata) rakhave. He tumacya tya sapathance prayascitta ahe, jevha tumhi asi sapatha ghyala. Ani apalya sapathanvara kayama rahuna tyance raksana kara, asa prakare sarvasrestha allaha tumacyasathi apale adesa spastatah sangato yasathi ki tumhi abhara manaveta
